resources.string: Instant health restore 40%, removes 1 Sv of obtained radiation.
Instant health restore 50%, removes 3 Sv of obtained radiation.
Removes 1 Sv of obtained radiation, drops 10% of health.
Removes 7 Sv of obtained radiation, drops 20% of health.
Eleminates emission effect, drops 30% of health.
Health restores 50% faster in clear locations, if less than 1 Sv is obtained. Lasts for 30 minutes.
Health restores 100% faster in clear locations, if less than 1 Sv is obtained. Lasts for 30 minutes.
Unlocked: a device that gives any shotgun the ability to destroy any mutant. It remains to find a technician, a lot of money and fasten it to the shotgun.
Unlocked: any optics for any weapon.
Unlocked: any collimator for any weapon.
Unlocked: any night vision device or optics for any weapon.
Unlocked: any fittable or not grenade launcher.
Mental strength 99% lower, Controller is 30% weaker for 30 minutes.
Mental strength 99% lower, Call of monolith strength 99% weaker, Controller is 60% weaker for 1 hour.
Unlocked: any pistol, only pistol ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any shotgun, only buckshot ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any submachinegun, only pistol ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any AK assault gun, only AK ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any NATO assault gun, only NATO ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any silenced gun, only silenced ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any sniper gun, only sniper ammo can be used with.
Unlocked: any machinegun, only assault ammo can be used with. NOT APPLICABLE FOR LONERS.
Unlocked: any gauss gun, only gauss ammo can be used with.
No meaning, no expirience. Just dead rat.
For pistols or revolvers of any type.
For NATO rifles of any type.
Special ammo for VAL or Vintorez silenced rifles.
For sniper rifles of any type.
For gauss rifles of any type. Can be radioactive.
Many things inside. Can be very useful.
One shot for your grenade launcher.
Radiation obtains 10% slower for 1 hour of any damage.
Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less for 2 hours of any damage.
Radiation obtains 50% slower, anomaly effect 40% less, mental effect 30% less for 2 hours of any damage.
Health restores 100% faster in clear locations, when less than 1 Sv of radiation is obtained, radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 40% less, mental effect 20% less for 2 hours of any damage.
Radiation obtains 80% slower, anomaly effect 60% less, mental effect 40% less for 1 hour of any damage.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, resist to mental 99%.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Health restores 200% faster in clear locations, when less than 1 Sv of radiation is obtained. Radiation obtain, anomaly and mental 20% less.
Fractional: Worn off after 3 hours of any damage. Radiation obtains 30% slower, anomaly effect 20% less, mental effect 10% less.
Common artifact. Reduces current radiation exposure by 5%. Gives you 1 experience point.
Common artifact. Reduces current exposure to mental radiation and Controllers mental attacks by 10%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 10%. Gives 4 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Increases health recovery by 50%, but reduces radiation resistance by 5%. Gives 5 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Reduces current exposure to radiation by 15% and provides protection from Buhrers telekinetic attacks by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Gives protection from Buhrers telekinetic attacks by 30%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
Very rare artifact. Gives protection from Buhrers telekinetic attacks by 60%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 30%. Gives 15 experience points.
Very rare artifact. Increases resistance to chemical anomalies by 30%. Gives 15 experience points.
Common artifact. Reduces current radiation exposure by 10%. Gives you 1 experience point.
The average rarity of the artifact. Resistance to thermal anomalies by 15%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 20%. Gives 10 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Resistance to thermal anomalies by 20% and reduces current radiation exposure by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 150%, but reduces radiation resistance by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 100%, but reduces radiation resistance by 5%. Gives 10 experience points.
A very rare artifact. Increases health recovery by 300%, but reduces radiation resistance by 30%. Gives 15 experience points.
Common artifact. Reduces current exposure to electrical anomalies by 10%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 10%. Gives 2 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Reduces current exposure to electrical anomalies by 15%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 15%. Gives 5 experience points.

The average rarity of the artifact. Reduces current exposure to mental radiation and Controllers mental attacks by 20%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 10% and to electrical anomalies by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.

The average rarity of the artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 200%, gives protection to electrical anomalies by 10%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 250%, gives protection to thermal anomalies by 20%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 20%. Gives 10 experience points.
A very rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 500%, but reduces radiation resistance by 30%. Gives 15 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 400%, but reduces radiation resistance by 99%. Gives you 20 experience points.
Common artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 50%, but reduces radiation resistance by 99%. Gives 5 experience points.
Very rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 600%. Gives you 20 experience points.
Common artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 100%, but reduces resistance to thermal and chemical anomalies by 10%. Gives 4 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 150%, but reduces resistance to chemical anomalies by 10%. Gives 6 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 200%, but reduces resistance to thermal and chemical anomalies by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Reduces current radiation exposure by 40%. Gives 10 experience points.

The average rarity of the artifact. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 600%, but reduces resistance to Buhrers telekinetic attacks, “Springboard” and “Carousel” anomalies, and radiation by 20%. Gives you 20 experience points.

Common artifact. Increases resistance to chemical anomalies by 30%. Reduces resistance to Buhrers telekinetic attacks, to the “Springboard” and “Carousel" anomalies, and to radiation by 10%. Gives 10 experience points.

The average rarity of the artifact. Increases resistance to chemical anomalies by 40%. Reduces resistance to Buhrers telekinetic attacks, to the “Springboard” and “Carousel" anomalies by 10%, and to radiation by 20%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases health regeneration in clean locations by 400%, resistance to Buhrers telekinetic attacks by 40%, but reduces resistance to radiation by 30%. Gives 10 experience points.
A very rare artifact. Increases health regeneration in clean locations by 300%, but reduces radiation resistance by 30%. Gives 10 experience points.
Common artifact. Increases resistance to radiation by 10%. Gives 5 experience points.
The average rarity of the artifact. Increases resistance to radiation by 20%. Gives 10 experience points.
Rare artifact. Increases resistance to radiation by 30%. Gives 15 experience points.

A very rare artifact, almost a legend. Increases resistance to chemical, thermal, electrical anomalies, mental radiation, and mental attacks of the Controller by 30%. Provides 100% protection against spatial anomalies. Increases health regeneration in clean locations by 400%. Reduces radiation protection by 40%. Gives 100 experience points.
A very rare artifact, almost a legend. Increases health recovery in clean locations by 900%, but reduces radiation protection by 40%.

A very rare artifact. The anomaly that generates it is still unknown. Increases resistance to “Springboard” and “Carousel” anomalies and Buhrers telekinetic attacks by 30%. Gives 50 experience points.
Mysterious artifact of unknown origin. It emits virtually no radiation and exposure. Only its magical effect on women is known for certain.
A Plant that was part of an abnormally altered grove. The trees reacted quite aggressively to the invasion, but the plant itself has not yet shown any dangerous properties.

This item was once an electrical insulator. Now it has almost formed into an artifact with unstable properties. It was the source of variable mental radiation. Medium-level radioactive artifact. Emits 6 Sievert radiation per hour while in inventory.

Once it was the wheel of a dredger, but now it is about a half-formed artifact. The artifact is quite unusual: it glows intensely, radiates a little, and thats it. A very radioactive artifact. Emits 14 Sievert radiation per hour while in inventory.
A very radioactive artifact. Emits 14 Sievert radiation per hour while in inventory.
Mastercode: All threats -10% less. Using 1 artefact slot.
Mastercode: All threats -25% less. Using 1 artefact slot.
Mastercode: All threats -50% less. Using 1 artefact slot.
Mastercode: All threats -75% less. Using 1 artefact slot.
